short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn subscription chaos into financial harmony

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Monitor all your subscriptions in one place. Get notified before renewals. Maximize savings, minimize hassles, with only one click right from your Gmail.

The extension is able to automatically recognize and populate subscriptions from multiple companies and support manual inserts and edits to cover the rest.

A license key is required to activate the extension, you can buy the license key with a one time payment at https://subwatch.co
